product_name: Columbia Drainmaker Board Shorts - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: From snorkeling to surfing, the Columbia Drainmaker Board shorts outfit you for days in or on the water. Quick-drying fabric means lasting comfort once you're back on the beach. Polyester/elastane blend fabric moves with you, and offers UPF 50+ sun protection; stretch-mesh lining. Drawcord waist secures the fit and laces like traditional board shorts; zippered security pocket. Closeout.
short_description: From snorkeling to surfing, the Columbia Drainmaker Board shorts outfit you for days in or on the water. Quick-drying fabric means lasting comfort once you're back on the beach.
